thread.title: Fast & Furious ride headed to Universal Orlando Resort
thread.title_full: Fast & Furious ride headed to Universal Orlando Resort

title: Fast & Furious ride headed to Universal Orlando Resort
text:
Fast & Furious ride headed to Universal Orlando Resort Wednesday August 26, 2015 Print Article 
A new tram enters brand new ‘Fast & Furious — Supercharged’ attraction during a test prior to opening at Universal Studios Hollywood in Los Angeles, June 19, 2015. — Picture by Emily Berl/The New York Times LOS ANGELES, Aug 26 — A Fast & Furious-themed ride will be racing over to Universal Studios in Orlando, Florida in 2017. 
After debuting at Universal Studios Hollywood in California this summer, the Fast & Furious Supercharged thrill ride will also open on the east coast, at sister site Universal Orlando Resort. 
Built to simulate high-speed car chases that exceed 120 miles an hour (193 km/hour), the immersive experience features 3D-HD imagery projected onto an world’s longest and most expansive 360-degree screen. 
The hydraulic, motion-based ride will include an original storyline to accompany the special effects. 
A sprawling backlot will also feature some of the car props from the film. — AFP-Relaxnews
